CustomField.formula: (IF( ISPICKVAL( Personalization__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Personalization__c , "N/A") , 1, 0 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Customization__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Customization__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( All_Questions__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( All_Questions__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Detailed_Explanation__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Detailed_Explanation__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Offer_to_Follow_Up__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Offer_to_Follow_Up__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Product_Positive_Comments__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Product_Positive_Comments__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) ) / 6
CustomField.label: Handling Skills Total %
